title: National debt of Japan 2024
yAxis: National debt in billion U.S. dollar
summary: Overall National debt in billion U.S. dollar has increased over the Year.
National debt in billion U.S. dollar is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2021.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest National debt in billion U.S. dollar, of value 12453.45 was reached at Year 2021
The lowest National debt in billion U.S. dollar, of value 11924.1 was reported at Year 2018
min_summary: In general National debt in billion U.S. dollar has stayed the same over the Year.
National debt in billion U.S. dollar is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2021.
